EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_HAWQ & Hortonworks_Q315.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal HAWQ & Hortonworks Data Platform Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Pivotal HAWQ and Hortonworks Data Platform: Modern Data Architecture for IT Transformation this Wednesday, July 22, 2015. We look forward to you joining us! Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, July 22, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PDT/5:00PM GMT
Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1010039/B2E81CE3D813692E72E975CC510A3100> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} See you Wednesday! The Pivotal Team
